title: Bug 12775[Dialogs] double click behaviour in move dialog (package view)
description: Bug 12775[Dialogs] double click behaviour in move dialog (package view) I think it's more natural that double clicking on projects,packages, etc.
OB: I doubleclicked on a project, but instead of expanding the project and showingthe children (source folders), it accepted the project as the target andcommited OK. would expand/unexpand the node.
SR: I doubleclicked on a project, but instead of expanding the project and showingthe children (source folders), it accepted the project as the target andcommited OK.
